verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> I Saw, <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Behold <S%G2400><s%> A Door <S%G2374><s%> Opened <S%G455><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> <S%G3588><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> I Heard Was <S%G191><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Of A Trumpet <S%G4536><s%> Speaking <S%G2980><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Me, <S%G1700><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Come Up <S%G305><s%> Hither, <S%G5602><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Will Show <S%G1166><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> What Things <S%G3739><s%> Must <S%G1163><s%> Take Place <S%G1096><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> These Things. <S%G5023><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> I Became <S%G1096><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Spirit; <S%G4151><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> A Throne <S%G2362><s%> Was Set <S%G2749><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne One <S%G2362><s%> Sitting, <S%G2521><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Who Was <S%G3588><s%> Sitting <S%G2521><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Like <S%G3664><s%> In Appearance To <S%G3706><s%> A Stone <S%G3037><s%> Jasper <S%G2393><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Sardius; <S%G4555><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Rainbow Was <S%G2463><s%> Around <S%G2943><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> Like <S%G3664><s%> In Appearance To <S%G3706><s%> An Emerald. <S%G4664><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Around <S%G2943><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> Thrones <S%G2362><s%> Twenty <S%G1501><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Four, <S%G5064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Thrones <S%G2362><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Twenty <S%G1501><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Elders <S%G4245><s%> Sitting, <S%G2521><s%> Clothed <S%G4016><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Garments <S%G2440><s%> White; <S%G3022><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Had <S%G2192><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2776><s%> Their Heads <S%G846><s%> Crowns <S%G4735><s%> Golden. <S%G5552><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> Go Forth <S%G1607><s%> Lightnings <S%G796><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thunders <S%G1027><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Voices; <S%G5456><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Lamps <S%G2985><s%> Of Fire <S%G4442><s%> Burning <S%G2545><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne, <S%G2362><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God; <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> A Sea <S%G2281><s%> Glass, <S%G5193><s%> Like <S%G3664><s%> Crystal. <S%G2930><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Midst <S%G3319><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Around <S%G2945><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Living Creatures, <S%G2226><s%> Full <S%G1073><s%> Of Eyes <S%G3788><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Behind; <S%G3693><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Living Creature <S%G2226><s%> <S%G3588><s%> First Was <S%G4413><s%> Like <S%G3664><s%> A Lion, <S%G3023><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Second <S%G1208><s%> Living Creature <S%G2226><s%> Like <S%G3664><s%> A Calf, <S%G3448><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Living Creature <S%G2226><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Face <S%G4383><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Man, <S%G444><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fourth <S%G5067><s%> Living Creature <S%G2226><s%> Like <S%G3664><s%> Eagle <S%G105><s%> A Flying. <S%G4072><s%>

And The <S%G2532><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Living Creatures, <S%G2226><s%> <S%G1520><s%> ' <S%G2596><s%> Each For Itself <S%G1438><s%> Had <S%G2192><s%> Respectively <S%G303><s%> Wings <S%G4420><s%> Six; <S%G1803><s%> Around <S%G2943><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Within <S%G2081><s%> Full <S%G1073><s%> Of Eyes; <S%G3788><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cessation <S%G372><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> They Have <S%G2192><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Night, <S%G3571><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Almighty, <S%G3841><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Was, <S%G2258><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Is, <S%G5607><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Who Is <S%G3588><s%> To Come. <S%G2064><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Shall Give <S%G1325><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Living Creatures <S%G2226><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Honour <S%G5092><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%> To Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Sits <S%G2521><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> , Throne, <S%G2362><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Lives <S%G2198><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages <S%G165><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ages, <S%G165><s%>

Shall Fall <S%G4098><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Twenty <S%G1501><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Elders <S%G4245><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Sits <S%G2521><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne, <S%G2362><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Worship <S%G4352><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Lives <S%G2198><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages <S%G165><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ages; <S%G165><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cast <S%G906><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4735><s%> Their Crowns <S%G846><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne, <S%G2362><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%>

Worthy <S%G514><s%> Art Thou, <S%G1488><s%> , O Lord, <S%G2962><s%> To Receive <S%G2983><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Honour <S%G5092><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Power : <S%G1411><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Didst Create <S%G2936><s%> <S%G3588><s%> All Things, <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> For <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2307><s%> Thy Will <S%G4675><s%> They Are, <S%G1526><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Created. <S%G2936><s%>
